version_description:
Bug fixes.

1. Upgrade the vocabulary training. Highly recommend by PM.
2. Here’s the benefit. Any users who register can be a three-day VIP member.
3. Could you please share our APP? We offer you the old exams!
4. The recording can be paused now.

What’s more, there’s surprise when you’re dong the exercise. Download to find it!

1. Ranking list is newly added. Come to see where you are on the list!
2. Some of the questions are updated and new voice actors joined in.
3. The intelligent question generation algorithm is optimized to make your training more efficient.

1. Key feature! Answer analysis newly includes translation
2. Improving the loading of the audio and optimizing the user experience
3. The translation of Japanese, Vietnamese and Thai language has been added
4. Totally new purchase interface for members

1. You can adjust the font size as you like 
2. Message center has updated. You can chat with our customer service 
3. VIP exclusive: Model essay display  (discount recently)
4. Highlight new words list 
5. Anonymize users synchronously after registration
6. Optimized other 6 details, download and have a try

1. You can adjust the font size as you like 
2. Message center has updated. You can chat with our customer service 
3. VIP exclusive: Model essay display  (discount recently)
4. Highlight new words list 
5. Anonymize users synchronously after registration
6. Optimized other 6 details, download and have a try
Bug fixes.

1. Refresh the rankings in real time
2. Added “Next Question” button on the analysis interface 
3. Added FAQ section on VIP purchasing interface to let you rest assured in your purchases 
4. Optimized many other details. Download now for the experiences

We've got some heated functions again!
1. Click the HSK exercises,you can get the translation and pronunciation of the vocabulary.
2. Add exam time setting in your personal information.
3. New function like Wechat payment.
4. Fix several details,come to download and experience it!

We've got some heated functions again!
1. Click the HSK exercises,you can get the translation and pronunciation of the vocabulary. 
2. Add exam time setting in your personal information. 
3. New function like Wechat payment. 
4. Fix several details,come to download and experience it!

We've got some heated functions again!
1. Click the HSK exercises,you can get the translation and pronunciation of the vocabulary. 
2. Add exam time setting in your personal information. 
3. New function like Wechat payment. 
4. Fix several details,come to download and experience it!

1. Add the Chinese level test function.
2. Add the vocabulary search function.
3. Add high-frequency vocabulary.
4. Add picture sending function to feedback and customer service system.
5. Add Card voucher exchange function.
6. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. Our team of teachers carefully prepared HSK preparation guides for everyone (answering tips)
2. Add HSK Online User Guide.
3. Add pre-test music to give users a feeling of being in exams.
4. Add Chinese level test results sharing function.
5. Optimized a number of details, please download and experience now.

1. Lifetime membership is available, HSK always be with you. 
2. Optimized some details. More options.

1. Add slow forward function.
2. Add new function to hide pinyin for vocabulary details. 
3. Display of all low-level vocabulary via high-level vocabulary is now available, no need to switch back and forth.
4. Optimize details, download and experience all the gorgeous available features.

1. First-class materials with the purchase of VIP
2. Add a third-party login to simplify the registration process
3. Optimize some details

1. It's now even easier to pass HSK with our renewed Companion + content!
2. We've added a "pre-exam sprint" unit, where you can review all the important content for your HSK level. Perfect to go over all the material before your HSK exams! (or just to refresh your memory) 
3. Come have a look at our new badges! Finish studying and you can collect badges to show off your study progress.

1. HSK 4 LIVE class is online now! Sign up now for face to face lessons with an experienced HSK teacher. 
2. Our LIVE classes are supported both on our app and web platforms. Enter "my live classes" to see your class schedule and directly enter the LIVE class! 
3. We've updated our HSK 4 Companion + course to integrate the 21 LIVE classes.

1. Our HSK 4, HSK 5 and HSK 6 demo classes are online now! For only $1, you can experience our new live classes, try it out! 
2. We have some surprises for you when you sign up! Get some super discount and your personal study gift pack. 
3. During the live class you can ask questions, answer HSK questions and interact with your teachers and new classmates. It works of both PC and APP! 
4. After the live class, you can join our HSK study group and ask your teacher all the questions you have about HSK.

1. HSK Online has an awesome new upgrade! The APP has had an all-round facelift to make your experience as a user even better!. Come check out the brand new interface and the systematic course design. 
2. Our VIP benefits have been restructured and now include systematic courses and a stronger review system to help you with the HSK exam content! We've also added a monthly subscription option, which you can cancel at any time. 
3. For those who are already VIP and VIP + members, you'll of course be able to continue using the app as before.
